text: Ahmadiyya Mikail ogly Jabrayilov (, ; 22 September 1920, Ohud village, Shaki Rayon, Azerbaijani SSR â€“ 11 October 1994, Shaki, Azerbaijan) was a purported Azerbaijani activist of the French Resistance.
